en: Valentine of a heart-shaped box and flowers

Valentine created by Gibson Greeting Gards and signed "As ever, 'Dinky.'" Message on the front of the card reads: "A valentine message for the one I love." Interior message reads: "For you alone. There's the sweetest love in our hearts / That only the two of us share . . . / And, darling, wherever you go / My love will always be there ~ / For each little thought I have / Seems only to be of you, / Because I'm so much in love, dear . . . / and hope you love ME / that much too!"

Valentine created by Gibson Greeting Gards and signed "As ever, 'Dinky.'" Message on the front of the card reads: "A valentine message for the one I love." Interior message reads: "For you alone. Interior message reads: "For you alone. There's the sweetest love in our hearts / That only the two of us share . . . / And, darling, wherever you go / My love will always be there ~ / For each little thought I have / Seems only to be of you, / Because I'm so much in love, dear . . . / and hope you love ME / that much too!"
